Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that gives just a single larger ion engine?  ReStockPlus gives single larger nuke engine.

Just wondering.
Near Future Propulsion by Nerta has a selection of bigger (and more power hungry) ion engines. Link: https://spacedock.info/mod/557/Near Future Propulsion
You could use tweakscale on the normal one

8 hours ago, theJesuit said:

Is there a mod that gives just a single larger ion engine?  ReStockPlus gives single larger nuke engine.

Just wondering.

 

LOL  Ion engines are already hugely overpowered compared to RL.  And yes, I do realize they need to be in the game
Mk2 and Mk3 Expansion have large ion engines in mk2 and mk3 profiles

Near Future Propulsion is a good bet- it has a variety of ion thrusters similar to, but slightly better than, the stock one (one has an ISP of over 19000s!) as well as Hall effect thrusters and a variety of plasma-based systems too (including PIT and VASIMR with variable performance), though they all use huge quantities of electricity in the process so you'll probably need nuclear reactors to satisfy their hunger for power.

The only other mods I know that add electric propulsion add one tiny ion thruster each- SSR MicroSat and OctoSat.
